meaning_str.bing:
n. 玩家；运动员；播放机；演员
网络. 选手；播放器；球员

玩家；运动员；播放机；演员

运动员；选手；参加运动者；队员；参与者；竞争者；演奏者；演员；表演者；滥交的男人

1.en: Gould said the parents of a 14-year-old tennis player were concerned their son was not focused all the time.
1.cn: 古尔德说，父母是14岁的网球选手而言，他们的儿子是不是集中了所有的时间。

2.en: Players should not stand close to or directly behind the ball, or directly behind the hole, when a player is about to play.
2.cn: 有人准备击球时，其他球员不可站的太靠近球位，或直接站在球位或球洞之后。

3.en: Juventus would not stand in Gianluigi Buffon's way if he wanted to leave the club, stated the player's agent Silvano Martina.
3.cn: 吉安路易吉？布冯的经纪人西尔维奥？玛蒂娜声称，如果布冯希望离开俱乐部，尤文图斯将不会阻拦。

1.en: Beijing is an important player on the global stage.
1.cn: 北京是国际舞台上一个重要的选手。

2.en: There's never been a player/owner, but maybe. Maybe.
2.cn: 从来就没有老板球员这种人，不会额可能会吧，有可能。

3.en: So, what do you do? Mostly player analysis right now.
3.cn: 那你都干些什么？目前主要做球员分析。

4.en: It's a music player. It's a thousand songs in your pocket.
4.cn: 这是一款音乐播放器，上千首的歌就装在你的口袋里。

5.en: And I just want you guys to know he was a beautiful player.
5.cn: 我只想让你们知道，他是一个动人出色的乐手。

6.en: The piano doesn't murder the player if it doesn't like the music.
6.cn: 要是钢琴不喜欢弹奏的音乐，它是不会杀了弹钢琴的人的。

7.en: A one-year contract means the same thing to a manager as to a player.
7.cn: 一年的合同没法干，对于教练和球员来说都一样。

8.en: The sending off, because I flicked out at one player. Diego Simeone Yeah.
8.cn: 我被红牌罚出场，因为绊倒了一名球员，迭戈·西蒙尼。是的。

9.en: You know, Jim used to say the OASIS was never supposed to be a one-player game.
9.cn: 吉姆曾说，绿洲不应该是单人游戏。

10.en: You must be the youngest Quidditch player in a century, according to McGonagall.
10.cn: 你一定是最年轻的球员，是百年最年轻的，麦格教授说的。

11.en: Sheldon Cooper is nothing if not a team player. Dr. Hofstadter, you have the conn.
11.cn: 谢尔顿·库珀如果不团队协作也一事无成，霍夫斯塔德博士，一切由你指挥。

12.en: Dad, come on, practice is over. Not till the last player leaves the gym. Team rule.
12.cn: 爸爸，练习时间结束了。最后一名队员下场才算，队里的规定。

13.en: A player makes a bunch of shots in a row. People are sure they're gonna make the next one.
13.cn: 运动员连续投球命中，人们确信他们会投中下一个。

14.en: Yes, it does! The star player has just arrived. No way! Someone else. Please! Anyone else.
14.cn: 那可不，明星选手驾到。门都没有，拜托换别人，谁都好。

15.en: Well, a decade ago, I founded a small nonprofit and I built it into a major global player.
15.cn: 十年前，我成立了个小慈善组织，后来影响力逐渐强大。

16.en: He was a hard player, my dad. He always used to say to me, "I'll let you know when you've made it."
16.cn: 我爸是个强悍的球员，他过去常跟我说"等你踢出名堂，我会告诉你的"。

17.en: But in a way I'm glad it happened cos it made me as a player, made me as a person, made me stronger.
17.cn: 我很欣慰发生了这一切，让我成为一名真正的球员，一个真正的人，让我更坚强。

18.en: And they took over the responsibility of, you know, bringing me up as a football player but also a man.
18.cn: 然后他们尽心尽责地将我培养成一个优秀的足球运动员，一个真正的男人。

19.en: When I really looked at everything, everything a basketball player Could do for himself individually And for a team, Jeremy Lin was the best player here, But yet colleges weren't clamoring for him. He just didn't fit the mold.
19.cn: 当我纵观这一切，一个篮球运动员能够为他自己，为球队做的一切，林书豪都是这里最好的球员，可是大学并没有争着要他，他不符合固有的模式
